thread.title: Bella Hadid Is Breaking Fashion Rules and Also Hearts
thread.title_full: Bella Hadid Is Breaking Fashion Rules and Also Hearts

author: Maria Ward
title: Bella Hadid Is Breaking Fashion Rules and Also Hearts
text:
Bella Hadid Is Breaking Fashion Rules and Also Hearts January 14, 2017 6:37 pm Expand Photo: AKM-GSI 
Ever since parting ways with The Weeknd last December, Bella Hadid has been winning the post-breakup game. There was that epic side-eye run-in at the Victoria’s Secret fashion show runway , followed by the ultimate revenge-body Instagram she posted just yesterday morning. Less than 24 hours later, and the supermodel was spotted in New York City with something new attached at her hip: a chain-wallet. 
The good-taste-bad-taste accessory has been making a comeback thanks to brands like Vetements, and the supermodel is the latest to jump on the unexpected trend. It was a nice addition to her cropped pinstripe trousers which were also just the right length to show off her Tamara Mellon caged cutout booties. There was a casual streetwise mood to Hadid’s styling, with a hoodie layered under a sleeveless denim vest. A top-handle bag and playful newsboy cap pulled the look together.
